patthana21.51:1.1_0: Nosaññojanaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nosaññojano sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. (Tīṇi pañhā. Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi,
patthana21.51:1.1_1: adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.51:2.1_0: Noganthaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nogantho sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.51:3.1_1: adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.51:4.1_0: Nooghaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noogho sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.51:5.1_1: adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.51:6.1_0: Noyogaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noyogo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.51:7.1_1: adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.51:8.1_0: Nonīvaraṇaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nonīvaraṇo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.51:9.1_1: adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.51:10.1_0: Noparāmāsaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noparāmāso sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.51:11.1_1: adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
